document.body:
Interest Surveys | Career Database Institution Database | Institution Survey Classroom Corner (new!)
Cooks, Fast Food Onet SOC Code 35-2011.00 Career Description: Prepare and cook food in a fast food restaurant with a limited menu. Duties of the cooks are limited to preparation of a few basic items and normally involve operating large-volume single-purpose cooking equipment.
